0c891085-a4f6-4abf-9958-75ce689c0cda.description: Each year, the American Gem Society (AGS) requires its titleholders to recertify their professional credentials. What does this mean to you? Completion of the annual recertification exam ensures that the AGS titleholder you are working with is up to date on the latest trends and developments in the jewelry industry. The exam also demonstrates their ongoing commitment to excellence, ethics, continued education, and consumer protection.
0c891085-a4f6-4abf-9958-75ce689c0cda.name: 2020 Recertification

987a3739-0d0e-494a-be9f-17d72227c3f1.description: As a Registered Jeweler (RJ), this individual has completed all the required coursework and classroom study by the American Gem Society, along with written and practical exams in diamond grading. In order to keep their title, they must pass a Recertification exam each year. An RJ title lets you know that the jeweler you are working with truly understands jewelry, diamonds, and gemstones, and has proven their commitment to their community and the highest standards of ethical practice.
987a3739-0d0e-494a-be9f-17d72227c3f1.name: Registered Jeweler

badge_template_activities.title: 5-Day Diamond Grading or Gem Identification Laboratory

0bf70d38-56f8-4a4b-8803-97a1490d1201.description: As a Certified Sales Associate (CSA), this individual has completed the most concise sales associate training programs available in the jewelry industry. Topics of study included diamonds, colored gemstones, pearls, precious metals, watches, and period jewelry, along with information about the jewelry industry and the importance of good customer service and professionalism. In order to keep their title, they must pass a Recertification exam each year.
0bf70d38-56f8-4a4b-8803-97a1490d1201.name: Certified Sales Associate®

df1fcaeb-751c-4195-a439-2d0a5cfd7e10.description: As a Certified Gemologist (CG), this individual has taken advanced studies in diamonds and colored gemstones. Every year, they must pass an annual Recertification exam, ensuring they stay on top of their game with the necessary skills and knowledge of the industry. A CG title lets you know that you are working with a master of diamond, gemstone, and precious metal testing procedures and that they have proven their commitment to their community and the highest standards of ethical practice.
df1fcaeb-751c-4195-a439-2d0a5cfd7e10.name: Certified Gemologist®

c300f6bc-0568-46e2-832f-959a69e261c2.description: As a Certified Gemologist Appraiser (CGA), this individual holds the most highly regarded title among peers in the jewelry industry. It certifies that this person can identify diamonds, gemstones, and jewelry, and determine their value. In order to earn this title, the associate requires advanced training and experience in determining the value of diamonds and gemstones. To stay on top of their game, a CGA must pass an annual Recertification exam.
c300f6bc-0568-46e2-832f-959a69e261c2.name: Certified Gemologist® Appraiser

4893fb26-6709-4f1c-8492-60d3f021f1c5.description: Confluence is the American Gem Society’s (AGS) annual virtual event offering industry professionals targeted learning based on their role in the industry. Members attend Confluence to boost their skills and learn innovative techniques to achieve their customer growth, sales, and marketing goals.
4893fb26-6709-4f1c-8492-60d3f021f1c5.name: Confluence 2021 Attendee

bef36a06-b15e-4fe6-a8ec-cd0daffecf93.description: Confluence is the American Gem Society’s (AGS) annual virtual conference offering industry professionals targeted learning based on their role in the industry. Members attend Confluence to boost their skills and learn innovative techniques so they can better assist their customers and offer a more enjoyable and positive jewelry-buying experience.
bef36a06-b15e-4fe6-a8ec-cd0daffecf93.name: Confluence 2022 Attendee

d42c46c6-16fb-4b60-aecd-e6bc7bbdbfe0.description: As a Registered Supplier (RS), this individual has chosen to go above and beyond to pursue their professional credential by fulfilling their gemological education and proving their commitment to ethical business practices.
d42c46c6-16fb-4b60-aecd-e6bc7bbdbfe0.name: Registered Supplier

9ff61662-6ccf-4253-aedd-a385c24699a2.description: This individual has chosen to be a mentor for the American Gem Society’s (AGS) Mentorship Program. The program was established to foster professional growth and career development through the mentor/mentee relationship. As a mentor, they served as a learning broker, coach, trusted advisor, and sounding board for issues relating to the mentee's career goals and development. They provided feedback, advice, and counsel to assist the mentee in developing and growing a career in the jewelry industry.
9ff61662-6ccf-4253-aedd-a385c24699a2.name: AGS Mentorship Program Mentor

e4a333b4-f512-4905-93d8-f71d176e4976.description: This individual is currently participating in the American Gem Society’s (AGS) Mentorship Program as a mentee. The program was established to foster professional growth and career development through the mentor/mentee relationship. A successful mentee is motivated and feels empowered to plan and manage the direction of their professional life. They are open to coaching, feedback, and guidance from their mentor.
e4a333b4-f512-4905-93d8-f71d176e4976.name: AGS Mentorship Program Participant

21d5bf74-38d6-4c61-af0b-8ce7cb2f704d.description: As a Team Member of the American Gem Society (AGS) and AGS Laboratories, this individual represents values and practices that support the mutual mission of consumer protection, ongoing gemological education, a high standard of business ethics, as well as consistent and accurate diamond grading.
21d5bf74-38d6-4c61-af0b-8ce7cb2f704d.name: American Gem Society Team Member

9043fe2c-28d7-468e-b1eb-acc859bf5dea.description: Independent Certified Gemologist Appraisers (ICGA) are independent jewelry appraisal firms that specialize in and are considered to be, the authority on the appraisal of gems, diamonds, and jewelry. This title represents those whose sole business is appraising. To receive this certification, the ICGA has completed an extensive course in personal property appraising. ICGAs must complete the annual Recertification exam, and also submit proof of continuing education in their field every five years.
9043fe2c-28d7-468e-b1eb-acc859bf5dea.name: Independent Certified Gemologist® Appraiser
